lead_paragraph: After Market, the winner of three consecutive races, including the Eddie Read, was chosen as the early 2-1 favorite for Saturday’s 25th running of the Arlington Million in Illinois. After Market, trained by John A. Shirreffs, drew the No. 4 post position. The field of eight 3-year-olds and up also includes the defending champion, The Tin Man, a 9-year-old gelding who will try to become the first back-to-back winner in race history.
